Header: US condemns Pyongyang missile plan, warns against 'provocative' actions
Content: The United States sharply condemned a North Korean plan to test-fire an intercontinental ballistic missile and warned Pyongyang against "provocative actions." The toughly worded US statement called on "all states" to show the North that any unlawful actions would have "consequences." It was issued by the Pentagon at a sensitive time - just weeks before President Barack Obama is due to hand power over to his successor, Donald Trump.
